

```{python}
import functai
import subprocess

functai.configure(lm = "gpt-4.1")

def subprocess_run(command: list[str]) -> str:
    result = subprocess.run(command, capture_output=True, text=True)
    return result.stdout

@functai.ai(stateful = True, tools = [subprocess_run])
def claide_coding_agent(message):
    ...

claide_coding_agent("what are is your current directory?")
```

claide_coding_agent("Without running a command (from previous answer) what is the user?")
